title: Purple pain
author: VD
content_html:
From TMQ:

Caviezel played Jesus in “The Passion of the Christ” and — I am not making this up — has said that to method-act sorrow on the cross, he thought about the Minnesota Vikings’ Super Bowl losses.)

I actually have a harder time with some of the playoff losses, strangely enough. Gary Anderson, Darren Nelson, Drew Pearson….

But I feel his pain.
